column5: Company of Heroes for your phone!!!! It is great. It is the original game intact for your phone or tablet. So great it hurts. Graphics and performance are dependant on you streaming vs downloading the maps and upgraded visuals. 2. Multiplayer did not exist when I purchased and may or may not come. 3. There are 2 control schemes. The default "mobile" is bad.
